org.apache.juneau.rest.client

Class SSLOpts

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.client.SSLOpts
  • Deprecated. 
    Use RestClientBuilder.sslSocketFactory(org.apache.http.conn.socket.LayeredConnectionSocketFactory) and others.

    @Deprecated
public class SSLOpts
extends Object

               SSLOpts.CertValidate certValidate,
               SSLOpts.HostVerify hostVerify)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        protocols - A comma-delimited list of supported SSL protocols. If null, uses the value returned by getDefaultProtocols().
        certValidate - Certificate validation setting.
        hostVerify - Host verification setting.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultProtocols

        protected String getDefaultProtocols()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the default list of SSL protocols to support when the protocols parameter on the constructor is null.

        The default value is "SSL_TLS,TLS,SSL" unless overridden by one of the following system properties:

        • "transport.client.protocol"

        Subclasses can override this method to provide their own logic for determining default supported protocols.

        Returns:
        The comma-delimited list of supported protocols.

      • getProtocols
